about_the_game:
【overview】
"Hoshina Amasawa" is an additional character in the derivative fighting game "MGCM Combat Edition" where you can battle with attractive characters, magical girls, and demons from "New Generation Urban Pop Magical Girl RPG "I Am Magicami"".
A magical girl who appeared in the origin world before the main story begins. She has two extremes in her special moves: one is a projectile technique that she has been refining for the purpose of destroying demons, and the other is a throw technique that she improved after she was advised by her friends to aim for a one-on-one matchup. Please enjoy the unique performance of the two versions of the same special move, where the A version is all projectiles and the B version is all throws.

content_descriptors.notes: This includes costume changes to thinner costumes, and certain techniques that suggest sexual acts. It also includes depictions of blood splatter during battles.
